evolution_stages.conversation_summary: Problems discussed: 1) Anxiety about job interviews and approaching professors, 2) Overthinking and deleting emails. Solutions offered/accepted: 1) Practicing interviews and pausing to breathe, 2) Drafting emails with mentor, keeping them concise and specific. Student's response to solutions: Positive, engaged in drafting and sending an email, showed reduced overthinking. Evidence of progress/improvement: Successfully sent an email to a professor, demonstrated increased confidence in communication.
